text: (a) Explain how a uniform cost search differs from a breadth first search Pay attention to the data structure that 1s used in each (4) (b) Consider Figure 1 In the four queens problem, we try to place four queens ona 4 x 4 chess board, so that no queen can capture another queen (..e there I1s only one queen on any diagonal, row, or column of the board) The placement of a queen Is called /egal if the queen is unable to capture any other queens on the board The start state is the empty board, and goal states are those boards that have four legally placed queens onthem (In the figure, children nodes are generated by attempting to place queens in columns from left to nght )
